name: The Shattered Elements Arena
description:
- Top down view, controller based 2D physics action
- Engaging maneuvering using both joysticks
- Four elements and a dozen unique incarnations to play with, both human and animal
- Up to four player local co-op or remote play using Steam
- Random, procedurally generated indie art environment with original music
- Enhance your mage throughout your journey by picking up items
- Four zones to traverse with different enemies and bosses
- Audiobook novel companion to the game coming soon
